channel.title: Comments on: Very Pleased with WebFaction + Hover

item.title: By: Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: I actually moved some domains from NameCheap - I much prefer Hover's web interface and support.
item.content:encoded: I actually moved some domains from NameCheap – I much prefer Hover’s web interface and support.

item.title: By: Tom Rodenberg
item.dc:creator: Tom Rodenberg
item.description: Thanks for recommending WebFaction earlier. I've referred a bunch of people to them and they have all had good experiences getting set up. Hopefully they will use your referral link ;-)
item.content:encoded: Thanks for recommending WebFaction earlier. I’ve referred a bunch of people to them and they have all had good experiences getting set up. Hopefully they will use your referral link ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: AndrewFerguson
item.dc:creator: AndrewFerguson
item.description: Other than not being GoDaddy, why did you choose Hover? Did you not choose NameCheap?
item.content:encoded: Other than not being GoDaddy, why did you choose Hover? Did you not choose NameCheap?
